p: Orbignya speciosa (babassu) fruits were collected from an area in the Chapada do Araripe (Sítio Arajara), Municipality of Barbalha, Ceará, Brazil. An exsiccate (#9709) of the species is found in the Caririense Dárdano de Andrade Lima Herbarium (HCDAL) of the Regional University of Cariri (URCA).
